com.facebook.litho

Class MountSpecLithoRenderUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.rendercore.RenderUnit<java.lang.Object>
      • com.facebook.litho.LithoRenderUnit
        • com.facebook.litho.MountSpecLithoRenderUnit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContentAllocator<java.lang.Object>, TransitionRenderUnit

    public class MountSpecLithoRenderUnit
extends LithoRenderUnit
implements ContentAllocator<java.lang.Object>
    This RenderUnit encapsulates a Litho output to be mounted using Render Core.
